Description: Whether to enable SSL on the proxy
Example value(s): true, false - See link above for full example

Description: Whether the proxy should redirect HTTP requests to HTTPS (make sure you have a valid cert if you leave this to true!)
Example value(s): true, false - See link above for full example

Description: Path to a SSL cert the proxy should use (this needs to be readable by the scalr-app user)
Example value(s): '/path/to/the/cert' - See link above for full example

Description: Path to a corresponding SSL key the proxy should use (same as above)
Example value(s): '/path/to/the/key' - See link above for full example
